lines.text: I just want a little piece of the action so I don't have to apologize every time I turn around, that's all.
Randy, I don't date skaters.
A skater! I ain't no skater, I am a goddamn star!
You bunch of female jock-strappers!
I said I'm okay when I'm okay and, ah... I'm okay when I'm not okay. Okay? Okay?
I guess they got their money's worth tonight, didn't they, K.C.?
But you can't just throw Hank on the dump heap after you've used him!
What the hell you talking about, use him? We're all used! You, me, anybody on two legs! That's what it's all about. That's your American pie for you. You ought to know that by now.

['spontaneous' argument for the climactic match race showdown]
Listen, this is a washed-up old bitch who can't even skate anymore, she trips over her own feet!
All because I'm being sick and tired of you being a glory hustler even on your own team. If KC Carr thinks she's so darn cute, I wonder how cute she'd be in a match race.
Yeah, oh listen to her, a match race, you must be joking! Man, a match race means nothing. I could beat you hands down, but if that's what you want...
Come on, KC
Yeah, that's right...
Cut it out!
We'll just have a match race right here, man, and we're gonna find out who's gonna leave Portland forever!
Anytime, anyplace, sugarpuss, I can tell you right now KC Carr had better start packing all her bras...
Oh come on...
Honey, at least I got bras and not egg-cups. Your boyfriend complaining?
[often mis-heard and incorrectly noted in subtitles as "A cups"]
Oh come on, you're both...
No holds barred -
[both girls talking over each other, unintelligible]
Oh boy, you're a bigmouth. How about right now?
Sure, come on!
[KC socks JB on the jaw, surprising her]
KC, cut it out!
One more time, let's see you do it again!
Sure, baby!
[kicks at Jackie]
Cut it out! Alright, do you wanna fight?
Yeah!
All right!
[walks away, done with it]
I've been telling you that!
